TextStrings.AlignCommit: Minimap has been set to the <color=#00ff00ff>{0}</color>.
TextStrings.CompassCommand: <color=#00ff00ff>/map compass <true|false></color> - Enables or disables the minimap compass.
TextStrings.ComplexCommand: <color=#00ff00ff>/map complex <url to map parts></color> - Sets the located to the map parts for complex mode.
TextStrings.ComplexCommit: Map Complex URL has been set to: <color=#00ff00ff>{0}</color>
TextStrings.MinimapCommand: <color=#00ff00ff>/map minimap <true|false|left|right></color> - Enables, disables or sets the default alignment for the minimap.
TextStrings.MinimapCommit: Minimap has been <color=#00ff00ff>{0}</color> for all players.
TextStrings.ModeCommand: <color=#00ff00ff>/map mode <true|false></color> - Enables or disables complex mode.
TextStrings.StartCommand: <color=#00ff00ff>/map startopen <true|false></color> - Sets the default state for the minimap.
TextStrings.UnknownCommand: Unknown command, type <color=#00ff00ff>/map help</color> for a list of commands.
TextStrings.UrlCommand: <color=#00ff00ff>/map url <url to map image></color> - Sets the map image, used as the background image.
TextStrings.UrlCommit: Map URL has been set to: <color=#00ff00ff>{0}</color>
